DOC.brief_summary: The investigator prospectively collect patient procedure-related data observational study order detect patient procedure-related risk factor poor outcome ( i.e . technical failure procedure ; procedure-related complication ) . Data prospectively report use standard report form patient follow 30 day detect late-onset complication .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Assessment Endoscopic Retrograde Cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP )
